roleset.name: strike lightly

example.name: all args
example.text: I rapped my knuckles on the counter.

example.name: not sure about this usage
example.text: Till one day the last freight had been jumped, the last pint had been killed, [the last beat]-3 had been rapped [*-3].

example.name: no surface mentioned
example.text: The teacher plunged the children into a new portion, this time in Hebrew, [*]rapping the stick incessantly.

example.name: no instrument
example.text: She could not count the times Herman had rapped on the door, just a couple of bangs that shook the whole damned closet and might, someday, break away the pipe connections from the wall.
example.arg: just a couple of bangs that shook the whole damned closet and might, someday, break away the pipe connections from the wall.

roleset.note: RAP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rap' based on sentences in brown. (from rap.01-v)

roleset.name: perform spoken rhythmic lyrics

example.name: args 0 and 3
example.text: I wo n't argue with you about rap music , I will only say that there are lots of talented hip - hop ARTISTS -LRB- including some here in Madison -RRB- who do not only rap about negative aspects of black culture .
example.arg: lots of talented hip - hop ARTISTS -LRB- including some here in Madison -RRB-
about negative aspects of black culture

example.name: args 0-2
example.text: @CubanCashh just rapped me a smooth ass line.
